meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>pond</kanji> for <kanji>electricity</kanji>? May seem weird at first, but if you think of something that's gathering all the electricity into one pond... that thing is like a <vocabulary>battery</vocabulary> (and is a battery).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
